Name: range
Description/Notes: The distance from the ADP head

Name: c_sound
Description/Notes: The speed of sound used in velocity calculations.

Name: temp
Description/Notes: The temperature measured by the instrument.

Name: Accel
Description/Notes: The vector acceleraton of the instrument

Name: AngRt
Description/Notes: The angular rotation rate of the instrument

Name: orientmat
Description/Notes: The instrument's orientation matrix in the earth reference frame

Name: corr
Description/Notes: correlation between the send and receive pings.
